title: Young journalists force the industry to change — whether it’s ready or not
description: For years, the news industry has talked about Gen Z: their shifting habits, their distrust of institutions, their preference for short-form content, and their disappearing attention spans. But in 2026, the conversation will flip. Young journalists will no longer be defined by how they consume news. They will be defined by how they create it....
